text: The JAC Heyue A20 is a Subcompact car made by JAC Motors from 2013 to 2014. == History and Features == The JAC Heyue A20 was shown at the Shanghai Auto Show in 2013. it started being made in September 2013 and was put on sale in China in December its positioned below the JAC Heyue A30. the car has a 1.3 and 1.5 liter petrol engines with a 5-speed both manual and CVT automatic transmissions. The Heyue A20 has a electric version called iEV7 it was launched at the Beijing Auto Show in 2014. during the launch it was planned to be named iEV5 but it was later renamed to JAC iEV it was sold with that name until 2016 it was then renamed to iEV7. This name was used on a electric version of the JAC Refine A60 but it was droped this version has a electric motor of 67 hp and has a 70Ah lithium-ion battery. == Markets == The JAC Heyue A20 was sold mainly in the Chinese market during its entire production. == Discontinuation == The production of The Heyue A20 ended in 2014 and was discontinued without a sucessor but the JAC iEV7 is still made until today. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: JAC Heyue A20
